name: Final Tower (hachimochi)
description:
A game developed for the BOSS RUSH JAM 2023. Theme: Makeshift.

Final Tower it's a cooperative boss rush pixel art 3D game, you and your friends take on the role of heroic adventurers who must battle through a series of epic boss fights to reach the top of a tower. Choose one of the available Classes and evolve your skills during the fight. 

Each boss presents a unique challenge that requires teamwork and strategy to overcome. With tight controls, challenging gameplay, and vibrant 3D pixel art graphics, this game offers a thrilling and satisfying experience for players of all skill levels. 

Work together to dodge attacks, unleash powerful combos, and unleash devastating special moves to emerge victorious in each boss battle. Are you and your team up to the challenge?

Final Tower it's still in development but for the moment includes one boss fight and a the Assassin Class fully cooperative online.

Mouse / KeyboardControllerMoveAWSDLeft JoystickSkill 1X ButtonSkill 2Skill 3Skill 4Confirm/AcceptLeft ClickCancel
